content: Unfortunately, this app is not there yet, though it's been the most expensive app I've ever purchased. Virtually none of the functionality responds. Of the $6 or whatever I paid for it, I feel like I'm getting about $1.20 worth of functionality for what does actually work. Fortunately, I'm able to adjust white balance, ISO, aperture, and use the autofocus button. Everything else does NOT work. I hope in the future this app will have all the functionality working properly.
Wouldn't connect BT on pixel 4a. It probably has more to do with Android 11 than anything else. It looks promising.

I downloaded this app only to pull focus my sigma 18 35 f 1.8 but unfortunately the app does not seem to pull or rack focus this lens... The focal distance are showing up though.. Any help is appreciated..

So far the camera connects fine but when you change any settings on the app they are not shared with my bmpcc 6k. Any help would be appreciated. I'll definitely change this review if I can figure out what's wrong.
Just tried to pair with BMC software 7.2 on my 12k body with my galaxy 8+. Would not pair even after clearing BT cache. Phone sees camera but wont pair.

Update 12/25/2020: bm update 6.9.6 fixes the bt issues. Now this app is a must have for bmpcc 6k owners. Thanks team! bmpcc 6k... Total failure... Connected but nothing worked, not even record... Big disappointment. Sorry for the bad attitude... I know u all have worked hard... I am at 6.9.5 and can't go back... I will update review once bluetooth is working.
replyContent: Hi regret inconvenience. Please note, BMD's firmware version 6.9.5v has bluetooth issues - it does not respond to changes sent from external device (eg our app). It is fixed by BMD in the next versions.

content: Works flawlessly with 6.9.6 on the BMPCC4K. Thanks guys. Great Job
replyContent: BMD has confirmed that the bluetooth is working with new version 6.9.6. We also added taking Stills feature. Can you confirm. Thanks.

content: App works great. I had issues using the focus function, which I was most excited about, but due to using a Meike Cine lens I'm not able to use that function. Its a fully manual lens which isn't supported. Can't wait to try this with a supported lens! Will update when I do.
Amazing üëè üôÄ just needs zooming
Doesn't work at all anymore with latest BMPCC4K updates
Worked excellent as compared to the previous review, realised was a black magic update issue that they fixed in firmware.
replyContent: Hi regret inconvenience. Please note, BMD's firmware version 6.9.5v has bluetooth issues - it does not respond to changes sent from external device (eg our app). It is fixed by BMD in the next versions. Hope that helps.

content: Please fix the EF 6K focus, it doesn't work, waiting for the update

I was disappointed that the camera doesn't seem to communicate focus position to the app (you cannot auto focus a point in the camera and have the app see that, so setting point to rack focus between takes awhile as both points must be manually focused from the app.)

Very nice apps with great features. Its annoying when doing playback you cannot pause, when u try to pause it jumps back to record mode. UMP G1, Uptdate: Today I had my first commercial shoot with the app in hand, i was 1AC and focus pullter. OMG IAM IN LOVE WITH IT. Although i nearly fat fingered changed a resolution setting without noticing, i found all the features grea. There is room for improvement but MUST APP for UMP owners.

So far so great on my pocket 4k ! Thank you for this app. I was so worried about not having an app for android. I love the focus pulling feature. I wish there was a way to set a different default for the rack delay though. Otherwise dynamite.
I tried resetting the camera, clearing all my bluetooth connections, clearing cache. Nothing so far, 6.9.6
replyContent: Hi George. Are you able to see the camera listed in the home screen? Pls mail me at hi@sayeffect.com. I will help you resolve the issue. Thanks

content: Great concept but too many bugs. I tested this multiple times on BMPCC 4K v6.9.6. Many of the primary record settings do not work, and the app seems unaware that its not sync'd to the camera settings. That's really bad. The off speed recording doesn't sync properly at all. It screwed up my settings and wouldn't change them to match whats on the cam. Also WAY too expensive for this obviously buggy app. Stop trying to reinvent the UI! Why make something so usable LESS so?
replyContent: Hi Richard, if can you emphasize on 'app seem unaware of sync'. Regarding the off speed - BMD has added sensor area in newer camera firmware but has not provided the same in Bluetooth api. Thus there is an issue with off speed.

Please note, BMD's firmware version 6.9.5v has bluetooth issues - it does not respond to changes sent from external device (eg our app). It is fixed by BMD in the next versions. Also taking still is supported in camera firmware >6.8. Please mail hi@sayeffect.com.

content: This latest version together with BMD's latest firmware makes it a pleasure to use. Well done.

content: Esta app es horrible. Se conectaba con mis PCC4K pero no era capaz de controlar ning√∫n par√°metro de la c√°mara. No s√© c√≥mo otros han podido hacerla funcionar. Desde luego yo lo intent√© como 10 veces con cada una de las c√°maras y nada. Ped√≠ que me reembolsar√°n y las desinstale.
replyContent: Hi Alfonso, BMD's firmware version 6.9.5v has bluetooth issues - it does not respond to changes sent from external device (eg our app). It is fixed by BMD in the next versions. You may upgrade the camera firmware to higher version so that you can utilize full features of the app. Please email us at hi@sayeffect.com for refund.

content: Great app, with many features! Especially like the quick view page with false color and playback very useful. Some kind suggestions: Streamline UI for Focus Racking. It is not as straightforward as other apps nor as smooth. Perhaps adding another page will help declutter screen info. Feature requests: Please add still DNG function for Android devices. Add function to toggle Horizon View and LUTS, or ability to control F1 F2 F3 presets from camera. Does zoom racking work with adapted lenses? With the combo metabones EF 2 MFT & Sigma 18-35 only focus rack works, and as mentioned, not as smooth as other apps offer.
replyContent: Hi Evan, we added feature to take stills (DNG). For others we are unable to add them bcoz of limitation of BMD's bluetooth api. As and when BMD allows any of the features you mentioned in the api we ll add it eg: the new stills feature. Also we are working on the UI for focus racking, can you mail us at hi@sayeffect.com for any ideas rgd the same.

content: It works great, displays everything in real time. One feature request--be able to control two or more cameras at once. Thanks.
replyContent: Hi Willie, multi camera connection was definitely in our development pipeline, but the cost to add is too much for us right now. kindly understand.

content: Edit- app works fine. It was the pocket 6k's firmware. Really useful app with all of the controls you need when filming. Wouldn't shoot without it.

content: Come on. No focus on 6k? All other features can be set directly in camera. Are you working on it please? Can we expect an update anytime soon? content: It's good app. No video feed though. PLEASE ADD VIDEO FEED!!!
replyContent: Sorry :(, Taking Live Feed is not made available by BMD in their Bluetooth protocol and hence, is not available in the app. Live Feed will never be possible as designed by BMD as bandwidth for a live feed cannot be handled over Bluetooth - that by nature has low bandwidth.

content: Unable to connect to Samsung Galaxy Tab S3
replyContent: Android Bluetooth is actually iffy, it helps to clear cache of bluetooth in Settings->Apps (select System Apps)->Bluetooth->Clear Cache, restart device and then re-pair. For any troubleshooting please DM us on www.fb.com/sayeffect. We will surely solve your issue.

content: I use this app daily with my BMPCC 4K, and it's quite frankly the only way I can do a 1 person shoot. It was worth it after day 1! This is not only for shooting in the wild, but also controlling the camera when I'm the one on camera and need to start/stop recording and adjust focus. Are there any updates which may allow for toggling of LUTs on/off on the camera?
replyContent: Thanks for your generous feedback. Sorry Micheal, currently BMD has not allowed modification of LUTs in their api, hence it is not available in the app. When BMD updates the firmware with the same, we will surely include it in the app.

content: This app is amazing. you can control the camera for moments when you can't touch the camera or be next to it. you could possibly use as a remote follow focus with the right lenses. replyContent: Thank you very much for your generous feedback. Please share the app with your bmpcc4k friends.

content: Really like this App. I wish it had more rack focus points to set. That would be huge. I use this App together with my Edelkrone HeadPlus and slider which is also controlled by Bluetooth. content: App keeps asking for a pin for bluetooth. This is the kind of thing that should be addressed up front. Don't put the user through this waste of time. Ok here is what happened since this first review. I found the solution by trial and error. Start up the app and it will ask for a pin number. Go to the black magic 6k screen to turn on bluetooth I believe it's under setup. As soon as you turn on bluetooth on the 6k your pin number should pop up. Install the number on the app and it will pare.
replyContent: Hi Stan, you have to pair the mobile to the camera in order for a connection and thus the app is asking for pin. Entering the pin is a one time setting to pair with the camera. You will find the pin in Camera->Settings->Bluetooth. Kindly mail at hi@sayeffect.com if you are having issues with connections.

content: So far I like the app, very useful, especially for self recording. My biggest problem is that it requires permissions for location data. Unnecessarily invasive. If this is for metadata, please make it an option and not a requirement.

content: Nice app, but the length of the focus slider is far too short to reliably achieve accurate focus. Even on a 10" tablet with the slider scale set to 2x. I *strongly* and respectfully suggest the addition of a mode in which the zoom and focus sliders occupy the entire height of the screen. In all other respects, this is the best app I've tried for the BMPCC 4k (and I believe I have them all). But the inexplicable decision to limit the size of the focus slider makes every app virtually useless for my work. Increase the size of the focus slider to the maximum height allowed by any particular device, and it's five stars all the way.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We deeply respect your advice, and we will try implement it soon.

content: It's pretty neat and comes in handy. Also makes you look really fancy on a shoot lol. I know the bmpcc isn't made for stills but this app would be a LIFE SAVER if it could capture stills somehow to compensate for the very bad way the camera handles it. Some things I wish this app would improve on: 1. Prevent screen from sleeping option - If I had my phone to the person doing the slating and the phone keeps sleeping I have to keep unlocking the phone for them. I could turn off the sleep feature myself but this would be nice. 2. Can't stop the app from running in the background without going into the app settings and forcing it to stop 3. Option to take stills - Yes I know this camera wasn't made for stills but having this in the app would make up for the very bad way it's done in camera 4. UI - User interface is pretty rough, everything is grey and white, I often get lost in the app and the overall look is unappealing I still like this app very much, It's very useful but if something that worked just as well and was slightly more flashy came along it wouldn't take much for me to switch.

content: Really great app! Needs an update to have all of the correct labels for the Blackmagic 6K, but I love the functionality!! You can change any setting and even run/stop the camera from your phone! That feature alone is one I've wanted for a long time. This will be great for my focus pullers to use so I don't have to worry about certain settings when operating the camera! The layout is nice and simple. It also connects in seconds which is invaluable. Very well done app.
replyContent: Thanks for your generous feedback. Please share it with your Blackmagician friends.

content: Fantastic app! Functions really well, interface is easy to understand and use, and even gives you more than you would get from the camera's actual interface! Best one available! Only suggestion I would have (unless the function is there, and I just didn't see it), are buttons that toggle false color, zebras, LUT, etc, much like the 3 Preset buttons on top of the camera...
replyContent: Thanks for your generous feedback. Toggling zebra is not available but increasing/decreasing zebra level is present. False Color/LUTs is not made available by BMD in their Bluetooth protocol and hence, is not available in the app.

content: Everything works well so far. Some things seem to not work flawlessly but I think its just user error. One thing that I don't believe is included is the ability to take photo from the app. I know this is not a camera for taking photos and that they are the same quality as a still from the video, but it would be nice to have.
replyContent: Thanks for your generous feedback. We are limited by what is designed by BMD regarding bluetooth controls. Taking still pics is not included by BMD in Bluetooth controls, so it is not possible to add it in the app. Regret inconvenience.

content: All works. One issue: the app keeps on running in the background - or at least a notification indicates that. Opening the app it is stuck on the bt connection dialogue as my camera is not where I am. So, how do I shut the app down without rebooting my phone?
replyContent: Thanks for your generous feedback. The bug that the app always works in background has been removed. The notification should go when a) close the app from our app settings b) swipe up and close the app in task manager in app. let us know if it helped or dm us on www.fb.com/sayeffect.

content: It worked but couldn't get focusing to work which is what I bought it for
replyContent: Hi Calum, will surely refund you for a bitter experience. Can you please email @ hi@sayeffect.com. If you want to give us a chance to help you troubleshoot, please DM to www.fb.com/sayEffect or mail @ hi@sayeffect.com. The App is used by thousands without issue. Please let us help trouble shoot.

content: Works as described. Good work.

content: Works great!

content: Looks promising, could find my pocket 6k but crashed everytime on sync. Got refund so giving this as feedback
replyContent:
Hi Ben, we have updated the app for the new firmware 6.6 and 6K. Kindly retry and let us know if u face any issues.

Things that cant be done in app for BMPCC 6K because BMD has not yet allowed the following in their Bluetooth Protocol:

1. Focus Control/Safe Area Control
2. Enabling Horizon
3. Magnified Preview Control
4. Add Custom Frame Guides

content: Works well for the most part. I'd love it if there was a way to mix audio input levels: right now I can only manipulate speaker and headphone levels. A LUT selection/toggle function would also be much appreciated.
replyContent: Thanks for your generous feedback. Audio input levels and LUT controls are not possible as BMD has limited the commands and not included them in their bluetooth protocol.

content: Everything you could ever need from a control app for the camera. I was shocked to see how much more there was than the official app which iOS only.
replyContent: Thanks for your generous feedback We are glad you are glad. :)

content: works like it should. Couldn't find the custom settings programmable function buttons if that's possible?
replyContent: Thanks for your generous feedback. Custom Settings/Presets are not possible to include at this point, because BMD has not enable bulk command interaction via bluetooth (Though their documentations says otherwise).

content: I updated my review because I got the app to work. This app has a lot of potential, however I recommend mentioning resetting the bluetooth app for others to see. I love this app and it does its job. However, I think there should be an option for shutter measurements and to change internal luts. Other than that everything is seamless. Thanks! :)
replyContent:
Thanks for your generous feedback. Luts cannot be changed because of limitation by bmd on the possible bluetooth commands. Regarding shutter, Can you elaborate on what you mean by shutter measurement. 

In the new update (1.0.16) we added option to measure shutter in 1 units. :)

content: works like promised

content: Took many tries to get bluetooth connected, but worth the wait. Great app. and very responsive support. thanks.
replyContent: Thank you having faith in the app. Android Bluetooth is actually iffy, sometimes it helps to clear cache of bluetooth in Settings->Apps (select System Apps)->Bluetooth->Clear Cache. and then re-pair. Again - thank you for having faith in the app :). For any troubleshooting please DM us on www.fb.com/sayeffect.

content: works great
replyContent: Thank you very much for your generous feedback. Please share the app with your bmpcc4k friends

content: Amazing app !!! All that a remote camera control must have !! I have tested with my UMP and all functions works perfectly ! juste one thing... the app crash if the UMP is set at a resolution of 4.6K. Hope that little problem will be solved in future version :) Keep up the good work guys !!
replyContent: The app was designed for the BMPCC4K, because we dint have a UMP to test it on. We guess that there would be three options to upgrade - Codec (may be UMP has more codecs), Resolution (UMP definitely has more resolutions) ISO levels (the 6.3 firmware docs says something about more ISO levels). dm us at www.fb.com/sayeffect to help us upgrade the app

content: fabulous app. As is, I absolutely love it. I would like to see a aperature step mode implemented in addition to single 0.1 increments. I love the tiny increments, but once you get to 5.2 or so, I could really use more of a 1/5 incrementing for smooth light transition. my sony does 1/3 steps and its irritating to fix in post.
replyContent:
Glad you like it! :) Thank you very much for your generous feedback. Please share the app with your bmpcc4k friends.
Can you DM me at www.fb.com/sayeffect, i will understand the requirement better.

content: Amazing app, hands down down worth the $7!
replyContent: Thank you very much for your generous feedback. Please share the app with your bmpcc4k friends

content: this is definitely the best controller app bar none. can't wait to see it come to iPad as we bought the iPad for this purpose, not realizing how limited the available iOS apps were. is it possible to add letters to the scene number, i.e. scene 15A? you can do this on the camera itself but none of the apps allow this. can you control multiple cameras at the same time? At NAB 2018 BMD said you could edit slate data and start all cameras at during multicam shoots. no apps do this, though.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your generous feedback. Oh! dint know about the slate. I will try adding it, but in mid-July, please bear as we have limited resources and are currently developing the IOS version. Regarding multiple cameras, it will be a very big change and yet to be tested. However will note and work on it 2-3 months down the line.

content: Got the app to work. Very good. I like that, by looking at other reviewers you are improving the app. It would be good to have a custom button page where you can add functions you use the most. Also access to the presets on the camera would be good for fast changing of settings.
replyContent: Great feedback, inline with what we thought about adding a Shoot Mode (a different page where you have record, focus, os, 2-3 customizable commands). We are focusing currently on ios development and are planning for Shoot Mode in July mid (due to limited resources). Presets cannot be accessed - limitation of bluetooth protocol by BMD, sorry :(

content: UPDATED: After further testing, if our UMP is on at the same time, this app will not connect to the pocket 4K, even if the Ursa mini pro is not paired with my phone. I'm not trying to connect them both to the app at the same time, the UMP Bluetooth cannot even be on. Also the app will not shut off unless I go into phone settings and force stop. Without the UMP Bluetooth being on, it works great! So if you don't have another camera using Bluetooth, you should be fine. I need both + separate apps
replyContent: Regret the inconvenience caused, however the issue might be with the mobile's Bluetooth cache. Can u please dm us at www.fb.com/sayeffect, we will help you trouble shoot and get it working. The pairing is only a 1 time process, and then you can use the app on your accord. If it is a persistent problem, we will refund, so that u are not at a loss :)

content: Had to try this app since the BMPCC4K is my favorite camera right now. Im loving the app so far. Great job on the functionality as well as the layout and look of it. Works smoothly on my galgaxy s8 phone. For future updates it would be nice to be able to set more than 2 focus points and also adjust the speed of rack focusing between the points.
replyContent: Overwhelmed !!! You are a Super star !!! Thank You for your generous feedback. Will rework on the UI/UX for Focus, because many users would like a better approach to it. However, Please wait till July-mid because we are currently making an IOS version and are constrained by resources.

content: Love this app! The play last clip is super useful. Is there any way to be able to scrub along the last clip, for example you have a few takes on that clip and want to scrub to one later on?
replyContent: Thank you very much for your generous feedback. The play last clip was iffy in Bluetooth (BT) response by the camera firmware, but we hacked whatever we could. There is no possibility in BT response to scrub video. We have asked BMD to enable next & previous clip and waiting for their response. Meanwhile, pls share the app with ur bmpcc4k friends.

content: Great app....Great design...Best app for BMPCC4K....the company is very responsive....loved it
replyContent: Thank you very much for your generous feedback. Please share the app with your bmpcc4k friends.

content: Just flawless.
replyContent: Two words we always love to hear. Thank You for your generous feedback. Please share the app with your bmpcc4k friends. Please also let us know in your review, what you like in the app, so that others can make an informed decision.

content: Love the app so far. I just downloaded it and so far first impressions are really good. By far the Best lay out I've seen and best I've user experience of any app I've used to date for the pocket 4k. I would really like if you made a similar app for the Ursa mini Pro!
replyContent: Thank you for such generous feedback. We do not have an UMP to test our app on, else we would have made one for UMP as well. Sorry for the wait.

content: Very nice it is working extremely smooth on my pixel 3XL. The only complaint I could make is that the layout arrangement is not perfect, but all the UI looks exactly like the bmpcc4k menu theme this is fantastic!!!

content: thanks for make this app really nice.. best app ever
replyContent: Thank you very much. Please share the app with your bmpcc4k friends.

content: Amazing app, it's nice to see one with the camera's own interface. The interface design makes it as easy as the real interface of the camera to navigate the various settings. Rack focus is great, can set even the smallest increments as needed. The company is also nice enough to accept suggestion and that alone makes it one of the greatest apps I have ever tried!
replyContent:
Thanx for your generous feedback :)
1. Rack focus is rescheduled for May  20th - | DONE  14 May|
2. Will work on focus slider, pls dm at fb - | DONE  14 May|
3. Change btw prores & Braw gets stuck - That is a BM firmware issue, we tried hard but sometimes the only solution is to change manually (for the first time) then the firmware responds well
